1.「うう……。こ…この気配は……。| <pc>……？ <pc>か？: Ugh... This... This is...<pc>  ...?<pc> Is it?

I'm feeling a lot better than I did when I|was outside. ... Now is the time to talk|about the bloody past that surrounds|
|Lunana...
